pages.title: Stay
pages.text: $(bold)Stay$() is another basic command your must teach your Pet Rock™.$(br2)It is disconcerting to have a rock that wanders around the house when you are not around.$(br2)To teach them this command, place your rock on the ground and stare at them firmly and give them the command $(bold)Stay$().

Surprisingly, most rocks have no difficulty learning this command and respond obediently the first time they hear it.$(br2)More often than not, Pet Rocks™ are more than happy to remain in the same position for long periods.$(br2)However, should you leave them unattended for an extended periods, they may hide nearby and refuse to come out even when called.
